name: Cyber Threat Alliance
goal: CTA is a non-profit association of cybersecurity companies created to share threat intelligence at speed at scale.  We aim to enable our members to better protect their customers, to strategically disrupt malicious actors in cyberspace, and to raise the level of cybersecurity across the digital ecosystem.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Foreign affairs and security policy
euInitiatives: EU cybersecurity and privacy regulations; digital economy; and similar topics.
